duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide administrative, analytical, and operations support to the Chief Operating Officer (COO).
Review financial information and propose effective strategies to the COO.
Review, propose, and implement improvements on processes and policies.
Assist with researching, analyzing, prioritizing, and following up on incoming issues and concerns.
Monitor, manage and improve the efficiency of support services such as IT, Finance, and Operations.
Assist in the development of strategic plans for operational activity.
Assist in coordinating the agenda and accommodations of meetings.
Organize office operations, procedures, including managing office supplies and building management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree, or equivalent work experience, required. Experience in the construction industry is required.
